*READ BEFORE DOWNLOADING*

Alot of people are not quite understanding this program and how to use and get the best out of it.
 This program is an optimizer, and what it will do is just that, it will optimize your current internet settings. (if you havent played around with them already).
So in theory you should recieve a slight increase in browsing speed, page's may open slightly quicker. 
 BUT what it will NOT do, is change your internet speed, like some people have claimed, from i.e 4mb d/l, 65kB/s u/l, to say 10mb d/l and 2mb u/l.
 If this program is still for you, to stand the best chance of finding out if you have made a slight improvement, what you need to do is take 5 readings in a row (using maybe  SpeedGuide.net) and add the speeds up and divide by 5 to get the mean score. 
 Do this 3 times in a day,morning,evening or night, to get the best chance of an accurate reading.
From personal experiance of this program, using it on a virgin machine, it DID make a slight improvement. But if you really want your machine to run faster there are a hundred differnt options depending on your o/s to do first.
